articles.content: After 25 years, James Cameron has admitted that both Jack and Rose could both have survived the sinking of the Titanic in his 1997 cinematic masterpiece, though there were "a lot of variables" in pla… [+3172 chars]

articles.author: Laura Parkin
articles.title: Lily Allen and husband David Harbour share a kiss on the big screen at New York Knicks game - Daily Mail
articles.description: The singer, 37, and the actor, 47, were spotted sat side-by-side while they enjoyed the game at Madison Square Garden in New York City.
articles.content:
Lily Allen and husband David Harbour shared a kiss as they appeared on the big screen during a basketball game on Friday.
